text.div:
BC OncotypeDxInvasiveRiskScoreInterpretationVS ValueSet

Intepretation of OncotypeDX Recurrence Score for invasive cancers.

name: OncotypeDxInvasiveRiskScoreInterpretationVS
title: BC OncotypeDxInvasiveRiskScoreInterpretationVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Intepretation of OncotypeDX Recurrence Score for invasive cancers.

concept.display: Recurrence Score lower than 18: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.
Recurrence Score of 18 up to and including 30: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. Itâ€™s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.
Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 31: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.
